name: HexonTD
description:
Note: This game is in early state of development

HexonTD is a Rougelike Tower Defence game inpsired by Slay The Spire and BTD with a simple premise, defend planets from the invasion of extraterrestial beings.

Features:

  • 5 Standard towers to help you defeat your enemies
  • Unique hero tower - Capable of connecting to nearby towers to gain buffs
  • Different types of enemies: 
    • Small quick enemies that can evade tower attacks
    • Armored enemies with resistance to plasma attacks
    • Enemies that on death spawn more enemies
    • ... and a lot more! (under development)
  • Card based spell system - Cards ranging from simple aoe damage to tower buffs and resources (More cards are being developed)
  • World map with different paths giving different permament upgrades
  • Maps change style depending on the region of the mission

Planned features:

  • Custom soundtrack
  • Bosses
  • Multiple classes that change your playstyle
